text: George Edward Bruns (July 3, 1914 - May 23, 1983) was an American composer and conductor. == Early life == Bruns was born in Sandy, Oregon to Edward Bruns and Augusta Weyer. His father is German and his mother is Russian Jewish. == References == * Category:1914 births Category:1983 deaths Category:American movie score composers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Musicians from Oregon
title: George Bruns
